How can I decode a raw transaction using the Verus API?

You can decode a raw transaction using the Verus API by sending a JSON-RPC request to the Verus server. Here's an example using `curl`:

```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "decoderawtransaction", "params": ["hexstring"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```

In this example, replace `"hexstring"` with the actual hex string of the transaction you want to decode, and `myusername` with your actual username.

i Examples: > verus decoderawtransaction "hexstring" > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "decoderawtransaction", "params": ["hexstring"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
